alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 1:33PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF EASTERN UINTA BASIN...TAVAPUTS PLATEAU...AND EASTERN UINTA MOUNTAINS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 133 PM MDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Whiterocks to 21 miles northeast of Sunnyside and moving east at 30 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Whiterocks and Fort Duchesne around 140 PM MDT. Vernal around 220 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Utah between mile markers 116 and 152. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 353 and 374. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains
